title: High cholesterol symptoms in legs at night: Warning signs you should never ignore
description: Leg pain, numbness, coldness, swelling, and skin changes, especially at night, can signal high LDL cholesterol. These symptoms indicate reduced blood flow due to arterial plaque buildup, potentially leading to serious heart issues. Early detection through regular monitoring and lifestyle changes is crucial for managing 'bad cholesterol' and protecting your health.

title: Pantone Colour of the Year 2026 is…
Bigg Boss 19 reveals the first look of its trophy as the top 5 finalists are announced
description: Bigg Boss 19's grand finale is just two days away, with Gaurav Khanna, Tanya Mittal, Amaal Mallik, Pranit More, and Farrhana Bhatt now the Top 5 finalists. The show unveiled its 'Gharwalon ki Sarkaar' themed trophy, incorporating Salman Khan's signature gesture. Malti Chahar's exit followed a heated exchange, leaving the finalists to pick their preferred winner, sparking further arguments.

title: Watch: IndiGo flight cancellations stretch into fourth straight day
description: Chaos persisted nationwide as IndiGo’s flight cancellations entered a fourth day. Delhi halted all departures till midnight, while Bengaluru saw over 100 cancellations. The airline blamed planning gaps in implementing new pilot rest norms. With more than 500 flights hit, disruptions spilled over to other carriers, prompting government intervention.

title: High Court rejects mosque's plea to use loudspeaker, says no religion mandates prayers with voice amplifiers
description: The Bench noted that the petitioner was unable to submit any material to show that the use of loudspeakers was mandatory/necessary to practice their religion

title: IndiGo flight cancellations LIVE: Civil Aviation Ministry constitutes 4-member committee to identify causes leading to flight disruptions
description: Aviation Ministry said flight schedules to return to normal by tomorrow; complete restoration of services in next three days

Frustrated, lying on floors, confused: Videos capture chaos as IndiGo cancels 500+ flights; watch
description: India's aviation sector faced a severe meltdown as IndiGo cancelled over 400 flights, leaving thousands stranded and airports in chaos. Passengers endured long waits and exorbitant fares on other airlines due to the crisis, triggered by cabin crew shortages. IndiGo expects full operational recovery only by February 2026, highlighting a significant disruption.

title: Starc breaks Pak legend's big record: 'Super Starc!' — Wasim Akram posts classy message
description: Mitchell Starc has become the most successful left-arm fast bowler in Test history, surpassing Wasim Akram's 414 wickets with a stellar 6/75 performance. Akram lauded Starc as a worthy successor, but the Australian humbly stated Akram remains the benchmark. Starc now ranks among Australia's top wicket-takers, with his pursuit of further milestones ongoing.

title: ‘Doomsday plane’: What is the ‘Flying Kremlin’? Putin’s jet was the most-tracked flight
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin's specially modified Ilyushin Il-80, dubbed the “Flying Kremlin,” became the world's most tracked flight en route to Delhi. This secure airborne command center, designed for extreme conditions and equipped with advanced communication and defensive systems, underscores Russia's strategic leadership protection.

Bomb scare on Dubai–Hyderabad Emirates flight: Threat email sparks alert; aircraft lands safely at RGIA
description: Hyderabad Airport faced a bomb threat for an Emirates flight from Dubai on Friday, prompting standard safety protocols upon landing. Passengers were safely deplaned after the aircraft was moved to an isolated bay. This incident follows a string of similar threats targeting flights to the city, raising security concerns.

title: 'Dhurandhar' Twitter review: Fans hail Ranveer Singh as a 'beast' and call the Sanjay Dutt, Akshaye Khanna, Arjun Rampal, Rakesh Bedi starrer 'paisa vasool'
description: Ranveer Singh's highly anticipated spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' has hit cinemas, earning praise for its ensemble cast, gripping plot, and BGM. Netizens are calling it a 'paisa vasool' entertainer, with Ranveer Singh's performance hailed as 'phenomenal' and Akshaye Khanna stealing scenes. Despite a lengthy runtime, the film is predicted to be a box office success.

title: ‘My approach to life is very student-like,’ says Aishwarya Rai Bachchan at Red Sea Film Festival
‘Opportunity for us’: RBI governor sees impact of Trump tariffs as ‘minimal’
description: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra views US tariffs on Indian economy as a minimal impact, calling it an opportunity for diversification and productivity improvements. Despite a significant 28.5% drop in exports to the US from May to October 2025, the central bank believes the domestic demand-driven economy will emerge stronger.

description: Thousands of passionate Indian cricket fans descended upon Cuttack's Barabati Stadium for tickets to the India vs. South Africa T20I, resulting in chaotic scenes. A viral video captured a frenzied crowd pushing and surging towards ticket counters, raising concerns about public safety amidst intense demand for the upcoming series.

IndiGo cancellations: On-time performance crashes to 8.5%! Over 400 flights cancelled
description: IndiGo's operational crisis deepened as on-time performance plummeted to 8.5% at major airports, leading to widespread cancellations and delays. The airline cancelled hundreds of flights, stranding passengers amidst overwhelming airport conditions. The DGCA has mandated a recovery roadmap, with IndiGo aiming for operational stability by February 2026.

description: Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor moved into their new six-storey Pali Hill bungalow with daughter Raha and Neetu Kapoor. Marking both their griha pravesh puja and Raha’s third birthday, Alia shared heartfelt photos featuring family rituals, tender moments, and glimpses of their lavish Rs 250-crore Mumbai home.

Pathan believes Jadeja's lack of urgency, scoring 24 off 27 balls, cost India crucial runs. Despite centuries from Kohli and Gaikwad, the team failed to capitalise fully, allowing South Africa to chase a formidable target.

description: LeBron James' record 1,297-game scoring streak ended Thursday night. He chose to pass for a game-winning shot instead of scoring himself. The Los Angeles Lakers secured a 123-120 victory over the Toronto Raptors. James' focus remains on team success. This unselfish play highlights his commitment to winning above personal milestones.

'Murdered all kids on Ekadashi': Occult omen or mental illness? Disturbing pattern of Haryana's 'killer mom'
description: A mother in Hisar/Panipat is accused of drowning four children, including her own son. While her family and victims' kin suspect occult practices, police point to psychopathic tendencies and a lack of remorse. The accused reportedly confessed to killing children perceived as more beautiful than her own. Authorities are investigating further, dismissing supernatural claims.

title: Los Angeles Lakers vs Toronto Raptors regular season game - Full injury report
description: The Lakers and Raptors face significant injury woes as they clash on December 4, 2025. With Luka Doncic and Marcus Smart out for LA, and Jakob Poeltl and RJ Barrett sidelined for Toronto, depth players will be crucial. This game becomes a test of adaptability and which supporting cast can step up.

title: Gabrielle Union on infertility as Dwyane Wade had child during split
description: Gabrielle Union revealed the profound devastation she experienced when Dwyane Wade fathered a child with another woman during a 2013 split, especially as she struggled with infertility.  She felt her soul was shattered, believing she had to let Wade go if she didn't pursue surrogacy to give him the family he desired.

title: Watch: Rasgulla shortage sparks massive brawl at Bihar wedding
description: In Bodh Gaya, a wedding celebration took an unexpected turn when a lack of rasgullas ignited a fierce altercation between the families. The groom's relatives argue that the dessert shortage was the trigger for the uproar, while the bride's family insists that unresolved dowry negotiations were the real cause, leading to injuries and a stalled ceremony.

title: IndiGo crisis: 'Plane ready but no pilot' - first-person account of a harried flyer
Travis Kelce’s bold Europe comments on Taylor Swift spark future rumors
description: Travis Kelce recently spoke about his trip to Lake Como with Taylor Swift. He described the beautiful scenery and the warmth of the local people. Kelce expressed his joy and wonder at the experience, finding a new appreciation for life's pace. George Clooney also joined the conversation, sharing his own fondness for the Italian region.

title: Kobe Bryant slammed by alleged friend, claims he 'wasn’t a good person'
description: New claims suggest NBA legend Kobe Bryant was not a good person and neglected family and friends. An alleged childhood friend shared disappointment over unmet promises of support. This contrasts with Kobe's documented generosity and mentorship. The allegations have sparked debate online, highlighting the complex nature of his legacy. Kobe's life included both personal challenges and significant positive contributions.
